attributes.action: wayne saunders pass on the reduction in the 15%V.A.T.rate
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
it has now been almost a year since the vat rate was reduced to 15%.
but unfortunatly this reduction has not been passed on to the consumer. 
this can be verified by the high street shops such as poundland and the 99 pence shops.the sales receipt's show vat at 15% but the items still cost you a pound or 99pence. this means that these shops have had a 2% increase in profits that have not been passed on to the consumer. 
these are not the only shops to have jumpt on to this band wagon.
will this 2% be collected from these outlets at the end of the year and be used to fund the pay back for this vat reduction. this money realy belongs to the patrons of these establishments but their is no way that they can claim this vat reduction back from these high street shops.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
